mapper.insert: insert into oneline_board_reply (reply_idx, all_reply_number, content, member_idx, board_idx, member_nickname, del_or_not) values(oneline_board_reply_seq.nextval, all_board_reply_seq.nextval, #{content}, #{member_idx}, #{board_idx}, #{member_nickname}, #{del_or_not})
mapper.select: select count(*) from oneline_board_reply where board_idx = #{board_idx} order by reply_idx desc
select * from oneline_board_reply where board_idx = #{board_idx} order by reply_idx desc
mapper.update: update oneline_board set reply_count = ( select count(*) from oneline_board_reply where oneline_board_reply.board_idx = oneline_board.board_idx) where board_idx = #{board_idx}
update oneline_board_reply set del_or_not = #{del_or_not}, content = #{content} where reply_idx = #{reply_idx}
